mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SEND_MESSAGE (ID, RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_ID) VALUES (#{id}, #{receiverId}, #{senderId})
mapper.select: SELECT sm.ID AS messageId, sm.SENDER_ID AS senderId, sm.RECEIVER_ID AS receiverId, m.MESSAGE_ALL_CONTENT AS content, m.MESSAGE_ALL_DATE AS sendDate FROM TBL_SEND_MESSAGE sm JOIN TBL_MESSAGE m ON sm.ID = m.ID WHERE sm.ID = #{messageId}
